allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add intelligent Transaction Copilot with sassy personality

- Add Transaction Copilot AI service with Claude integration
- Implement sassy, smart personality that encourages saving
- Add auto-create categories with emojis (25+ predefined)
- Add user onboarding flow (salary, pay frequency, debts)
- Add category confirmation when confidence is ambiguous
- Add Transacciones page with search, filter, and delete
- Add collapsible sidebar with mobile-responsive design
- Add money parsing for various formats ($2,500.00 vs $2.50)
- Add transaction delete functionality to dashboard
- Add userProfiles table for storing user preferences
- Add categories CRUD with subcategories support

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
